name: betula - subversion browser/visualiser
short_description: Betula is a web-based application for visualizing the Subversion (SVN) history of a project. The main advantage over existing viewers like ViewVC is that it gives a good graphical overview of which changes were applied to which branches/tags.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Version Control :: Subversion
